text.value: When did you start working as a CHW
Please list main duties related to human and animal health
Prenatal, Meternal and Postnatal health care
Disease surveillance (collection and reporting data to higher level)
Please specify other responsibilities if any
How would you describe disease surveillance
Data use in planning and decision making
What do you think your role is in disease surveillance
What topics were covered during training
What makes you suspect a person has a disease
Please specify how you identify human patients
What makes you suspect an animal is sick
Please specify how you identify animal patients
What guides you towards identification of suspected cases
Probe for any written instructions, reference guides
Please specify if other guideliens are used
How would you determine whether your suspected case indicates an outbreak
Probe if there are thresholds levels for different diseases
Have you ever experienced any disease outbreak in your village
Please specify if you have experienced an outbreak or not
What type of HUMAN outbreak you experienced
What type of ANIMAL outbreak you experienced
When was the last time that there was an outbeak
How did you discover that there was an outbreak
Number of days between onset and official reporting
0: I don't know, -1: No official reporting
Number of days between official reporting and detection
0: I don't know, -1: No official reporting
Number of days between official detection and first response
0: I don't know, -1: No official reporting
Recording of health events at community level
Where do you keep records of health events
Please specify other ways records are kept in any
What challenges do you face when recording health events
probe if they ever run out of forms
Please propose solutions to these challenges
How would you submit/notify higher level authority on disease events
Specify other means of notifying/submission if any
How often do you notify/submit reports
What factors influence you to report
Location to report close to home
Disease affecting both humans and animals
What factors limits your motivation to report
Don't know who to report to
Don't know how to record events
Don't know how to detect human events/disease
Don't know how to detect animal events/disease
When was the last oubtreak you were involved in
What kind of activities where you involved in
After submitting health event report to a higher level, do you get feedback
Please specify if you get feedback after submission of reports
Specify other feedback mechanisms if available
When was the last time you received feedback from higher level
Please specify last time you received feedback
What was the number of days between report submission and getting feedback
Please specify number of days between submission and feedback
What do you do with recorded/reported disease data
Please specify what you do with collected data
Speficy other ways data is being used
Who is responsible for data analysis and interpretation in your area
Ownership of mobile phone and its usage in surveillance
What type of phone do you own

Does your mobile phone support internet
Please specify if your phone supports internet
Android: settings > system > about or IOS: Settings > general > about
Are you aware of the usage of mobile phone to collect and send disease reports
Have you ever used mobile phone to collect and transmit disease reports
Please specify if you have ever used mobile phone to collect disease reports
What phone functions did you use in reporting disease events
Answer only if respondent has used mobile phone in reporting
Are you currently using mobile phone to collect and transmit disease reports
Please specify if your currently using mobile phone to collect and transmit data
Why are you currently not using mobile phone to collect and transmit disease reports
Answer only if he has stoped using mobile phone to report
Please mention any organisation working to facilitate use of mobile phone technology to collect and submit disease reports
Perception of use of paper-based vs electronic system for collection and submission of health events
What do you think are the BENEFITS of PAPER-BASED system in collection and reporting health events
What do you think are the LIMITATIONS of PAPER-BASED system in collection and reporting health events
